column4: well i set the samba server up all the ways i could and the xfer rates are still lousy, it has to be a sanba thing as apache serving the same files across the same network it full ethernet speed.
this is from a linux to linux box? or linux to windows?
for ubuntu to ubuntu - ive been using that fusessh filesystem this week (as a test) and its amazingly good. :)
the smb config file has some tips in the comments for making it work a little faster.
